story:
Once upon a time, in a land far, far away, there was a beautiful and peaceful kingdom called Shiraz. This kingdom was known for its lush gardens, bustling bazaars, and most importantly, its magical creatures. Among these magical creatures was a tiny, friendly dragon named Daryush.

Daryush was no ordinary dragon. He had bright blue scales that shimmered in the sunlight, and his wings were so large that they could cover an entire football field. But despite his fearsome appearance, Daryush was a kind-hearted dragon who loved nothing more than making friends and helping those in need.

One day, Daryush was flying over the kingdom when he noticed a little girl crying by the side of the road. Her name was Leila, and she had lost her way home. Daryush swooped down to comfort her and asked if she needed help.

Leila looked up at Daryush with tears in her eyes and nodded. Daryush picked her up gently in his claws and flew her over the kingdom, searching for her home. As they flew, they passed over beautiful gardens, bustling markets, and ancient palaces.

Finally, they found Leila's house, and Daryush gently set her down on her doorstep. Leila's parents were overjoyed to see her and thanked Daryush for bringing her home safely.

From that day on, Leila and Daryush became the best of friends. They would spend their days exploring the kingdom, playing games, and having adventures. And whenever Leila was in trouble, Daryush was always there to help.

Years went by, and Leila grew up to be a kind and wise young woman. She never forgot the friendship she shared with Daryush, and she always made sure to look out for him just as he had looked out for her.

And so, Daryush and Leila lived happily ever after, spreading joy and magic throughout the kingdom of Shiraz.

Now it's time for you to close your eyes and drift off to sleep, knowing that you too have a magical friend who will always be there to look out for you. Goodnight, my dear.
